title: Urgent
description:
Rich Monahan, Sammy Sponenburg, and Nisha Coleman share stories about grapefruit fucking, anaphylactic shock and the loss of a dear friend.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Hudson, Sammy Sponenburg, Nisha Coleman, Leif Vollebekk, Jeff Barr, The Jayhawks, Angel, U.S. Army Blues, Kevin Allison, Rich Monahan)
